org.security.crypt.asymmetric

Class AsymmetricAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.security.crypt.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.security.crypt.AbstractEncryptionAlgorithm
        • org.security.crypt.asymmetric.AsymmetricAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, EncryptionAlgorithm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RSA

    public class AsymmetricAlgorithm
extends AbstractEncryptionAlgorithm
    Provides asymmetric encryption and decryption operations using a public/private key pair.
    Author:
    shivam
